paragraphs.title: Imports for LuceneRDD
paragraphs.text:
%spark
import org.apache.spark.SparkConf
import org.apache.spark.sql.{Row, SparkSession}
import org.zouzias.spark.lucenerdd.LuceneRDD
import org.zouzias.spark.lucenerdd._
import org.zouzias.spark.lucenerdd.logging.Logging

msg.data:

import org.apache.spark.sql.{Row, SparkSession}
import org.zouzias.spark.lucenerdd.LuceneRDD
import org.zouzias.spark.lucenerdd._
import org.zouzias.spark.lucenerdd.logging.Logging

result.msg:
import org.apache.spark.SparkConf

import org.apache.spark.sql.{Row, SparkSession}

import org.zouzias.spark.lucenerdd.LuceneRDD

import org.zouzias.spark.lucenerdd._

import org.zouzias.spark.lucenerdd.logging.Logging

paragraphs.title: Load ACM and DBLP articles as Spark DataFrames
paragraphs.text:
import spark.implicits._

// ACM
val acmDF = spark.read.parquet("data/linkage-papers2/linkage-papers-acm.parquet")
println(s"Loaded ${acmDF.count} ACM records")
acmDF.cache()
acmDF.printSchema()

// DBLP
val dblp2DF = spark.read.parquet("data/linkage-papers2/linkage-papers-dblp2.parquet")
println(s"Loaded ${acmDF.count} DBLP records")

// Ground truth DataFrame
val groundTruthDF = spark.read.parquet("data/linkage-papers2/linkage-papers-acm-vs-dblp2.parquet")

// DBLP LuceneRDD
val dblp2 = LuceneRDD(dblp2DF)
dblp2.cache()
dblp2.fields()

paragraphs.title: Define Entity Linkage Function

msg.data:
tokenizer: (s: String, threshold: Int, comb: String)String
linker: org.apache.spark.sql.Row => String = <function1>
